ValidationRule.description: The non-billable incurred subtotal for an Expense (any non-billable amount plus any non-billable tax) must not be greater than the Expense amount itself (or zero, whichever is greater).
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The non-billable incurred subtotal for an Expense (any non-billable amount plus any non-billable tax) must not be greater than the Expense amount itself.
